extendedInfo.description: Are you a super fan of bubble style games? Are you tired of the monotonous scene and the same gameplay of the classic shoot bubble game but you still can't help enjoying it!Bubble Kingdom will give you much more new fresh and exciting experience! Come on, let's begin the adventure of bubble kingdom.âââââ How to play âââââ - Tap the screen to shoot the bubble to group 3 or more the same color bubbles to make them burst;- The less bubble you used to complete a level, the more score you can get;Tips: Touch down to adjust the aiming line and touch up to shoot.âââââ Highlighted Features ââââââ 300+ levels of Challenging Puzzles in 5 different worlds!â Exciting new lovely bubbles with cute expressions!â Power Up with Rainbow, Bomb and Rocket Bubbles!â Facebook Connect - beat your friendsâ scores!â Variety game modes frequently illustrated in different well-designed levels to keep your feeling of freshness!â Fresh and beautiful style, bright and vibrant graphics & effects!

reviews.title: Very fun...
reviews.comment: This game is fun with Super Cute fruits!! Even my 5 year old loves it!!! :)
reviews.author: Jessica Whitworth

reviews.title: Waiting??? Why???
reviews.comment: Would be a decent game if you didn\'t have to wait for the heart meter to fill. Can\'t kill time if you only play 5 minutes! DELETED!
reviews.author: Jorge Cruz

reviews.title: Love this game!
reviews.comment: I really like this game. As each level & stage gets harder, the more addicting playing gets!
reviews.author: Candence Jarmon

reviews.title: great fun!!
reviews.comment: nice and relaxing fun game!  really enjoying the cute faces!
reviews.author: Maggie Casling

reviews.title: Great for everyone
reviews.comment: Great game for everyone watching the different colours pop. My niece whos four absolutely loves playing this game
reviews.author: Claire Welsh

reviews.comment: Love love love this game! All Ezjoy games are awsome..have them all.
reviews.author: Standing Surrendered

reviews.title: Improved
reviews.comment: I had problems with the game but it\'s been rectified to a point. Good job. But the issue now is I have been unable to open the game, it goes blank and returns to idle mode, what\'s happening?
reviews.author: Chika Moronu

reviews.title: Five stars if ads less often
reviews.comment: Very addicting,  good to pass the time
reviews.author: Sandra Lapuste

reviews.title: \342\230\205\342\230\205WALK AWAY FROM THIS GAME \342\230\205\342\230\205
reviews.comment: This game gives colours that exist only in the last row-are you kidding me? Then the game says \"you failed\"-how come? Give There me something I can work with. Too many ads, even though I play those games.  Can\'t get more than 2 stars, despite in one game I only used 3 balls
reviews.author: Katie Tuck

reviews.title: Easy but addictive
reviews.comment: First game I go to now. LOVE it.Anyone can play it. It gets a little more challenging each level which makes u luv it even more.
reviews.author: Kristine Smith

reviews.comment: I love this game. Maybe a little more help prizes
reviews.author: Kimberly Welch

reviews.title: Its ok
reviews.comment: Frustrating how the bubbles are never the same color or order but whatever!
reviews.author: Kristina Sandoval

reviews.title: Only goes to level 100
reviews.comment: I would rate this a 5 star but it only hours to level 100 then the game is over wIth.  Other then that it is highly addicting and a 5 star
reviews.author: Shay love

reviews.title: Addictive fun
reviews.comment: Would have been 5 but the voice really grates me.
reviews.author: Kevin Bowerman

reviews.title: Cute!
reviews.comment: So fun!  Love the lil cute faces!  & able to play on my sucky phone lol! Yay >.<
reviews.author: leandra kana

reviews.title: Really colourful, fun and addictive
reviews.comment: Quite simply this game keeps you in a happy childish mood and is very addictive
reviews.author: nahidur rahman

reviews.title: Fun and addictive
reviews.comment: I love this game. I used to play candycrush, ever since this game, had stopped playing that. Keep playing bubble kingdom. Feel continue to play if I failed. But it seems like not so many people playing in facebook. Nice game, nice and colourful graphic.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game, annoying adverts.
reviews.comment: A really cute, entertaining game with some of the addictive quality of candy crush. The sneaky adverts that you accidentally tap on are seriously irritating though.
reviews.author: catherine simpson

reviews.title: Excellent addictive
reviews.comment: Can\'t put it down
reviews.author: Pat Earle

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: Fun game, great little time killer unless you get addicted to it like i did, cant put it down once i start it
reviews.author: Alison Wakefield
